00022         class Texture
00023         {
00024         public:
00025                 Texture(): 
00026                   myInitialized(false), 
00027                   myDirty(true),
00028                   myData(NULL) {}
00029 
00030                 bool isDirty() { return myDirty; }
00031                 void setDirty() { myDirty = true; }
00032 
00033                 byte* getData() { return myData; }
00034                 void setData(byte* data, int width, int height) { myData = data; myWidth = width; myHeight = height; }
00035 
00036                 int getWidth() { return myWidth; }
00037                 int getHeight() { return myHeight; }
00038 
00039                 GLuint getGLTexture() { if(myDirty) refresh(); return myId; }
00040 
00041                 OUTILS_API virtual void refresh();
00042 
00043         private:
00044                 bool myInitialized;
00045                 bool myDirty;
00046                 GLuint myId;
00047                 GLubyte* myData;
00048                 int myWidth;
00049                 int myHeight;
00050         };
